title: MEMETICS AND DISTRIBUTED COGNITION  - 03102022
description:
Virtually Not Alone Network Event

Rumblings from Thunder Bay
Pageau ^ Maundrell:  /watch?v=Y6OoY632GgI
McG:  /watch?v=XzT4tcC-aag
Haven't figured out Wai Wai is full of it since 2012: /watch?v=axaH4HFzA24
Maundrell Hedonic Adaptation:  /watch?v=eJDRrICxm4o
Oil:  /watch?v=QUQXgmtDVBQ
Music:  /watch?v=byfBksff7A4
Chad's Outro:  /watch?v=Kfw0LxwxvSk
LARPgate Earthquake (talk like a pirate day, turns out):  /watch?v=UrtZt-U4nAw


Add a Mudhut Illustration to your Christmas List:
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

Check out the Channel's Community Tab!
Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/2bZtrzTYza
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/

Here's where you can get the lobstamonkee on stuff:
T-shirt: (accepting vendor pitches)
Cup:
